item.description: I hope you join us for the most fabulous Christmas themed music experience. This show has it all: beautiful voices, beautiful music, beautiful people, beautiful story line, wonderful lights,real fire, and real snow - amazing energy and MOST of all the spirit of this wonderful group of people will change you and the way you think of everyday things. The narrator has an amazing deep voice that slides each word off of his vocals to the innermost parts of your soul. The voices are truly voices of angels. There is even an electric guitar war..... this show is AMAZING !!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Fun Singles sign just inside the wheelchair entrance. You should be able to spot me easily since I will be with my friend who is wheelchair bound
item.name: Trans Syberian Orchestra Concert
